phrases: kyou mo omoide ga hitotsu fueteku
I walk through the white pages of my storybook
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences.
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine;
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
it reaches all the way to my heart.
hohoenmi de kureta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
They were all saying such weird things...
It is my right as your boyfriend!
It should be the other way around!
You have always been helping me
It is my special privilege to be the one to help you.
That way, we can go throw them away together.
I am sorry that had to happen in front of everyone.
I did not want to hide it, and I wanted to make it clear before any sort of rumors started.
That I like you, and that I am dating you.
I do not want any more misunderstandings or confusion about it.
Oh man, and I confessed in front of everyone too, did not I?
I did not mean to do that one...
That was embarrassing, was not it?
You were trying to tell me how you felt.
You wanted to tell me, and everyone around me.
All lovey-dovey on your way to the trash?
You are going to clean instead of Miura!
It is pointless if you come.
If good fortune exists in the world, there has to be the same amount of misfortune!
Kazehaya just wanted a girlfriend, that is all.
I am sure they will break up soon.
I feel kind of lonely now.
I am really glad no one's attacked Sawako about it.
Yeah, like those girls from last time.
There might be one girl crying in secret.
We are not saying you should do anything or anything like that!
It is been like a dream come true.
But when I do, I cannot help but think of Kurumi as well.
Not just Kurumi, but everyone who was shocked by this.
Because until just a little while ago, they could still dream.
But now, I am standing on those dreams.
I might have been rejected, but I clearly told him how I felt!
If it were not for those words,
if it were not for Kurumi...
I am sure she is going to find Kurumi.
I am only saying this because I understand how she feels.
There is really nothing you can do about this.
It is important that she knows that, is not it?
Does he really have a girlfriend?
You heard the rumors, did not you?
If I knew this was going to happen, I would have hurt her worse earlier!
That is why Kazehaya will never like you girls.
Are you trying to start a fight?
Actually, you were the one who told us about Sadako back then.
Were you trying to use us?
You girls were just as underhanded as I was.
You were not able to confess to him, but you were able to harass Sawako.
And how are you any different?!
Besides Sawako, we are all the same.
Is it true about you and Kazehaya?
You are blackmailing him somehow, are not you?
I bet Yoshida and Yano are
Do not you think you are pitiful, going on like that?
This is something that Kazehaya decided for himself.
What are you sounding so stuck up for?
Like you have any right to say that!
You are the one who spread rumors about her!
What do you think would happen if we told Kazehaya about that?
If you do not care what Kazehaya will think about you afterwards, go ahead.
I am sure he will think, why is she bringing this up now?
And then, he will realize your hidden intentions.
Kazehaya hates people who tattle on others just to get ahead themselves.
And I am sure if you did something to Sawako, he would never forgive you.
I am sure he would never forgive you.
I am not done talking to
You think you are so great now that you are going out with him?!
I cannot believe he is taken!
Why did not you say so?
You would have given up if it were Kurumi?
You would have been happy if it were someone in your circle?
There is nothing wrong with still having feelings for him.
There is nothing wrong with it, but there is nothing noble about an unrequited love either.
If you do not do anything, it will just keep dragging on.
If you are not the one to bring things to an end,
will not your regrets be because you did not act soon enough?
Is not it wrong to blame Sawako for your own shortcomings?
None of you had any problems with Sawako before this, did you?
You were not thinking about reputations or worrying about rumors.
I am sure it was the same for Kazehaya.
He is not the type of guy who would choose to date someone because of reputation.
And that is why you fell for him, is not it?
You know all of this, do not you?
It hurts, but you want him to be happy.
Why act so tough about it?
What is wrong with feeling sad?
Not for him, but for yourselves.
I am glad it all worked out, Shota.
No matter how you look at it, I am definitely the MVP of this whole thing.
Despite whatever else, there were times when your words made me rethink things.
I even gave Kuronuma advice when you were not looking.
This is really important to me.
I want to make it work.
So glad you were able to make such a wimpy little confession.
Are you even listening to me?
Kiddo, in love, only the first to confess gets to fight to become a girl's true love.
The second, third, and on do not even have the right to compete.
So fight your hardest if Kuronuma's true love ever appears.
What do you mean by that?!
What, did you come to brag?
I am sure if our positions were switched, you would have come to tell me.
I told you, did not I?
That I would not congratulate you or anything.
I am sure you would have.
I just wanted to tell you.
I told you that I clearly told Kazehaya how I felt about him.
I was only able to do that because of you.
If you were not there, there is no way I would have ever been able to tell him.
Even though I was rejected in the end.
I am happy to have been rivals with you.
I overheard what you were saying earlier.
Nothing, just thought it was unexpected.
She came to me expecting that I would yell at her, and I was planning to.
But she did not say anything.
If she had said thank you or I am sorry, I would have punched her.
Did you ever hope that maybe I would get with Sadako?
If Kazehaya was going to fall for me, he would have already done it long ago.
I tried my best, but it was not possible.
If I had looked more closely, I would have seen it.
Kazehaya's a different person when he is with her compared to how he is with other girls.
I have never seen him with that sort of expression before.
I have never knew that side of him.
Even if I hate it, I understand it now.
Kazehaya will never like me now.
I did something he hates more than anything else, after all.
It is impossible for you to be with him.
I bet you are thinking now, that it would have been better if you were a guy.
And that even if he knew about what you did, it would be okay.
I do not need to hear that from you.
When I think that this can finally end now,
and even Kurumi cannot handle everything perfectly.
And Sadako is much cuter than I thought she would be.
I guess I am glad all of this happened before I started to like her.
I think the fact that I think that is the most unexpected of them all.
Oh, and you are nicer than I thought.
I was not able to say anything.
I felt that there was nothing I could say.
If I were you, I think I would have done it the exact same way.
There is nothing you could have sad.
It was because Kurumi was there.
I am so glad we were rivals.
Both of those thoughts are true, but neither of them are things I can say to her.
Different people in different positions with different feelings...
I am happy to have been rivals with you.
I have gained another precious memory today.
I have been waiting for you for so long
D-Do not worry, I just came early.
I was so nervous that I woke up ahead of schedule.
that even your sighs and hesitation have become precious.
It is different from a movie theater, is not it?
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it.
I just want to tell you, over and over again.
And this was your Valentine's Day gift.
I have wanted to give them to you, but I could not bring myself to do it until now.
I do not know the first thing about being a good girlfriend, but
Kuronuma, it is not a job.
I am so happy, almost too happy, that sometimes I wish time would pass even faster.
Faster, so that being with you would become something normal.
Do not wish for something so wasteful.
I always thought that only I had feelings for you and not the other way around,
and that I was the only one who felt such happiness.
Kazehaya feels the exact same way I do.
